author: Paul Farhi, Sarah Ellison and Elahe Izadi, The Washington Post
title: Crisis devastating news industry. Many newspapers won't survive...
description:
Two months ago, Cleveland Plain Dealer reporter Brie Zeltner became consumed by one topic: the coronavirus crisis that would soon sweep into her state. 
 The veteran health-care journalist chronicled the early reports of illness in nearby states, and then the…
